attributes.action: Stop telling us what we can and can not celebrate in our own country!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should we have to change anything about our holidays due to offending others that have came to this country for the way it is not the way they want it, for example where I work we can not call our "" CHRISTMAS TREE A CHRISTMAS TREE "" it has now been called a "" FESTIVE TREE "" if they don't like it then tuff! we don't tell others what they can and can not do with there celebrations.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
